Resources for Data Science

Explore a curated collection of tools, datasets, tutorials, and guides to enhance your data science journey.

📂 Free Datasets & APIs

Practice your skills with these free and publicly available datasets.

  • Data-artikelen | Sargasso - Data journalism and articles.
  • The Guardian Datablog - Data journalism and visualization from The Guardian.
  • Knoema - A comprehensive data marketplace.
  • Amazon Public Datasets - Large public datasets available on AWS.
  • Socrata - Data solutions for governments and organizations.
  • Data Publica - Business-oriented datasets.
  • Archive-It - Web archiving services for institutions.
  • Google Public Data Explorer - Visualize and analyze public data.
  • Zanran - Search for numerical data.
  • Quandl - Search and download economic and financial datasets.
  • IMF Data and Statistics - Data from the International Monetary Fund.
  • The World Bank - Global development data.
  • OECD.Stat - Data from the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development.
  • UN Data - Global statistics and datasets from the United Nations.
  • European Environment Agency - Environmental datasets and maps.
  • London DataStore - Open data from London.
  • Seattle Open Data - Public datasets from Seattle.
  • Chicago Data Portal - Open data from Chicago.
  • Austin Data Portal - Public data for Austin.
  • San Francisco Data - Open datasets from San Francisco.
  • Kaggle Competitions - Data science and machine learning challenges.
  • Causality Workbench - Challenges focused on causal inference and machine learning.
  • Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME) - Health-related datasets.
  • Gapminder - Statistics for global development.
  • UCI Machine Learning Repository - Comprehensive machine learning datasets.
  • DataHub.io - Share and publish datasets.
  • Data.gov - The official U.S. open data portal.
  • Data.gov.uk - The official UK open data portal.
  • Data.gov.au - Open data portal for Australia.
  • Open Data Canada - Canada’s open government portal.
  • Kaggle Datasets - A hub of datasets for all levels of data science projects.
  • UCI Machine Learning Repository - A comprehensive archive for machine learning datasets.
  • Data.world - A platform for open data sharing and discovery.
  • Awesome Public Datasets - A collection of free datasets hosted on GitHub.
  • ACM KDD CUP - Prestigious data science competition.
  • Kaggle Competitions - Various ML & AI challenges.
  • Causality Workbench - Causal inference & ML competitions.
  • TunedIT - Data mining & ML dataset challenges.
  • TunedIT ML Datasets - Extensive ML datasets.
  • UCI ML Repository - Comprehensive ML datasets.
  • mldata.org - Open datasets for machine learning.
  • IHME Health Metrics - Global health statistics.
  • Gapminder - Global development data.
  • NYC Schools Data - NYC public schools research.
  • The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA) - Medical imaging datasets.
  • Google Ngram Viewer - Historical language data.
  • Data.gov (USA) - U.S. government open data.
  • Data.gov.uk - UK open data.
  • Open Data Canada - Government datasets.
  • EU Open Data Portal - European Union datasets.
  • India Open Data - Government datasets from India.
  • Yelp Academic Dataset - Business & review data.
  • Lending Club Statistics - Loan & credit data.
  • Data.gov Federal Agency Data - U.S. open datasets.
  • Sunlight Labs - Political transparency data.
  • Federal Reserve Data - U.S. economic data.
  • Stanford Large Network Dataset - Large-scale networks.
  • IMDB Dataset - Movie industry dataset.
  • Enron Email Dataset - Public corporate email data.
  • MovieLens Dataset - Movie recommendation system data.
  • Twitter API - Access real-time tweets.
  • OpenWeather API - Weather & climate data.
  • Alpha Vantage - Stock market APIs.
  • NASA Open APIs - Space & earth observation data.
  • COVID-19 Data API - Live pandemic tracking.
  • Google Maps API - Mapping & geolocation services.
  • Data.gov.uk - The UK government’s open data portal, including metadata on all UK books and publications since 1950.
  • Data.gov - Search through 194,832 USA datasets covering topics like education and agriculture.
  • US Census Bureau - The latest population, economic, and behavioral data in the USA.
  • European Union Open Data Portal - Thousands of datasets on a wide range of topics across Europe.
  • NASA Open Data - Space, science, and engineering datasets from NASA.
  • Seattle Open Data - Public datasets from the city of Seattle.
  • Healthdata.gov - Detailed healthcare data covering multiple health-related topics in the USA.
  • UNICEF Data - Statistics about the situation of children and women worldwide.
  • World Health Organization (WHO) Data - Health, nutrition, and disease statistics from WHO.
  • National Climatic Data Center - The world’s largest archive of climate data.
  • New York Times Archive - Searchable archive of all New York Times articles from 1851 to today.
  • CIA World Factbook - Country-based statistics on geography, government, economy, and more.
  • ACM KDD CUP - A series of annual machine learning competitions.
  • Kaggle Competitions - Data science and machine learning challenges.
  • Causality Workbench - Challenges focused on causal inference and machine learning.
  • UCI Machine Learning Repository - A collection of machine learning datasets.
  • Google Dataset Search - A tool for discovering publicly available datasets across the web.
  • Amazon Web Services Open Data - Large repository of public datasets including the Human Genome Project and NASA's archives.
  • ImageNet - A large dataset for training deep learning image recognition models.
  • Google Finance - Real-time and historical financial data.
  • Quandl - Economic and financial datasets.
  • FRED Economic Data - US economic data from the Federal Reserve.
  • Gapminder - A collection of datasets covering economic, medical, and social statistics.
  • Common Crawl - A dataset of web page data collected over time for research purposes.
  • Twitter API - Access real-time and historical social media data.
  • Google Public Data Explorer - Interactive data from various international organizations.

    • Open-Source Tools

    Access powerful tools and libraries to accelerate your projects.

    • Python - A versatile programming language for data science and machine learning.
    • Pandas - A library for data manipulation and analysis.
    • Plotly - Interactive graphing and dashboard creation.
    • Scikit-learn - A machine learning library for Python.
    • Jupyter Notebooks - An open-source tool for interactive computing.

    Tutorials and Guides

    Learn from industry experts and kickstart your data science career.

    • Coursera - Online courses from top universities and companies.
    • Kaggle Learn - Free micro-courses on data science and machine learning.
    • Towards Data Science - Blog articles and tutorials by data science professionals.
    • Google ML Crash Course - A quick introduction to machine learning by Google.

    Code Snippets and Templates

    Jumpstart your projects with pre-built templates and reusable code.

    • GitHub - Explore open-source repositories for inspiration.
    • LLmachine Code Snippets - Custom templates and scripts for common tasks.
    • GitHub Gists - Share and discover reusable code snippets.
